recommended_degree: Administrasi Bisnis, Bisnis Internasional, Manajemen, Ekonomi, Teknik Industri (Sarjana)
job_description: Supports the assigned international markets by coordinating daily needs with Operational, Commercial, and Supply Planning teams. This role includes assisting in order processing, monitoring shipment schedules, preparing basic commercial documentation, and ensuring smooth communication across departments. The position is based in Gunung Putri and requires strong attention to detail, proactive coordination, and the ability to work with cross-functional teams.
